description:
This is a birthday present for my illustrator, Huke papa~!　👏
"Bokura no Ashiato" (Our Footsteps) was the ending song for Black Rock Shooter, originally composed and performed by supercell, which huke papa did the character design and jacket illustration for.
これはキアラの担当絵師、hukeパパのための誕生日プレゼントです！
hukeパパがジャケットをとキャラデザインを担当していたsupercellの歌う僕らのあしあと(ブラック☆ロックシューター ED)を歌わせていただきました。

-Credits-
Vocalist: Takanashi Kiara
Composer: supercell
Mix: Gojo Kai
Guitar: Roommate
Art: mamaloni
Video: Raina Illune

💖[Takanashi Kiara's 2nd Original Song, 【Heart Challenger】] 💖
Streaming: https://kiara.streamlink.to/HeartChallenger

🔥[Takanashi Kiara's First Original Song, 【HINOTORI】] 🔥
Streaming: https://kiara.streamlink.to/hinotori

🐔[Takanashi Kiara Thanksgiving 2020 Special Voice Pack]🐔
BOOTH: https://hololive.booth.pm/items/2533383
GeekJack: https://www.geekjack.net/takanashi_kiara/language/en/

 🏵️[Hashtags] 🏵️
#kfp​ #キアライブ​#hololiveenglish​ #holomyth​ #takanashikiara​ 
FANART #artsofashes​ #絵ニックス​ 

 🏵️[Twitter] 🏵️
https://twitter.com/takanashikiara


＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝


[Viewer Rules]
Thank you for watching my stream!
To help everyone enjoy the stream more, please follow these rules:
1.Be nice to other viewers. Don’t spam or troll 
2.If you see spam or trolling, don’t respond. Just block, report, and ignore those comments.
3.Talk about the stream, but please don’t bring up unrelated topics or have personal conversations.
4.Don’t bring up other streamers or streams unless I mention them.
5.Similarly, don’t talk about me or my stream in other streamers’ chat.
6.Chatting before the stream starts is fine as long as it's not completely unrelated to Takanashi Kiara.
7. Backseating is welcome in most of my streams unless I say so. No spoilers!


＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝
